00078 extern NSString *NULLPointerErrorDomain;
00079 extern NSString *BOOLErrorDomain;

00081 void NSXMakeErrorImp(const char *objCType_, intptr_t result_, const char *file_, unsigned line_, const char *function_, const char *code_, NSError **error_);
00082 
00083 #define NSXMakeError(ERROR, CODE)   \
00084     do{ \
00085         typeof(CODE) codeResult = (CODE);   \
00086         NSXMakeErrorImp(@encode(typeof(CODE)), (intptr_t)codeResult, __FILE__, __LINE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, #CODE, &ERROR);   \
00087     }while(0)
00088 
00089 #define NSXReturnError(CODE)    NSXMakeError(error, CODE)
00090 
00091 #define NSXThrowError(CODE) \
00092     do{ \
00093         NSError *error = nil;   \
00094         NSXReturnError(CODE);   \
00095         if (error) {    \
00096             [[NSException exceptionWithName:NSXErrorExceptionName   \
00097                                      reason:[error description] \
00098                                    userInfo:[NSDictionary dictionaryWithObject:error forKey:@"error"]] raise];  \
00099         }   \
00100     }while(0)
